project.name: Notifications Example
project.description: Demonstrates capturing and firing notifications and uses AJAX to send notifications to the browser.

properties.furtherInfo: A notification is fired every time something happens in the iBeans container (this is configurable). This example demonstates using the JavaScript client listening to these events and displaying them in the browser. The user can send secure and non-secure echo requests to the browser which will trigger different notifications. The example source code will show that Google Guice is used to configure the server components.
